reference.shortdesc: The bookpartno element contains the part number of the book, such as 99F1234.I don't fully understand how this element is to be used. Usage information suggests that it can be used by the publisher. Does it have other uses?

section.title: Usage information
section.p: A publisher may use the bookpartno element to identify a book for tracking purposes.

section.title: Specialization hierarchy
section.p: The bookpartno element is specialized from data. It is defined in the bookmap module.

example.title: Example
example.p: The following code sample shows how the bookpartno element can be used to identify the part number of the book:
